title: Why is Fiora so unpopular in M&G?
body:
Because she only does Ripostes!
https://i.imgflip.com/9enhl.jpg?a410496

~~I mean while I would normally down vote because this is a riposte, this is a riposte joke, but this riposte joke was riposted plenty of times, but this thread is about ripostes...~~ Fuck it heres an upvote

I note how one of them is also made by you. Kinda ruining it by double-post. ;)

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/GjehyjGU-why-is-fiora-so-unpopular-in-mg

Ah, I see the difference now. You will have to educate me further on the ways of the forums, because after how long is a post considered a repost(e) as opposed to a double-post?

Also, after how long is a thread considered dead? Or, put differently, what is the acceptable timelimit to not perform thread necromancy?
Either you are too well versed in this, or you have no idea what I'm talking about. But I like your style!
I clicked on this hoping that there was another joke about the joke in and of itself being a Riposte, but those hopes were apparently too grand a challenge to live up to.
You should be ashamed yet proud.

Because I main her and no one likes me
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
